meanings.definition: The state or fact of being visible.
meanings.sent1: The visibilities of the stars in the night sky were breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The fog reduced the visibilities on the road, making driving difficult.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear and reappear, playing with visibilities.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, increasing the visibilities of joy around her.
meanings.sent5: The artist used vibrant colors to enhance the visibilities of the painting.

meanings.sent1: The binoculars increased his visibilities of the distant mountains.
meanings.sent2: The fog limited the pilot's visibilities during the landing.
meanings.sent3: Wearing glasses improved his visibilities of the whiteboard in class.
meanings.sent4: The telescope expanded our visibilities of the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The lookout tower provided panoramic visibilities of the surrounding forest.

meanings.definition: The relative possibility of being seen or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The bright colors of the car increased its visibilities on the road.
meanings.sent2: The camouflage jacket reduced his visibilities in the forest.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a neon hat in the dark increased his visibilities to others.
meanings.sent4: Her talent in singing brought her visibilities in the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The unique design of the building enhanced its visibilities among tourists.
